Breakthrough
drilling performance via targeted
machine learning

Exebenus is a company of drilling engineers and data scientists, who thrive on shared commitment to delivering value.

We believe in the transformative power of digitalization. machine learning and

automation
in oilfield operations.

mission

Develop unique, data driven, real-time machine learning applications for drilling and completion optimization, safer operations and cost reductions
Data. Machine learning.
Your experience.
Let’s make it all work for you.
No need for trainingon offset data
Minimal config time to get started
Easily scalable to any # of wells
Vendor neutral Plug & Play on your WITSML

How it work?

Self adapting algorithms

to any lithology, bit type, BHA and mud properties

Pre-trained physics-
informed targeted models

with rig status recognition

Built-in automatic data cleaning

and pre-processing

Sign up to experience the power of Exebenus Machine Learning

Digitalization. Operations.
Your ambitions. Let’s make the connections.
Improve operational consistency and confidence
Reduce human error and increase safety
Reduce downtime and lower operational costs

Training
and support

If you are a player in the oil and gas industry today, you are already on the road toward digitalization. Our experts will guide you through the process, one manageable step at a time.
